name: prometheus-feedback
description: Prometheus Feedback Tool - Mobile-First React + Node.js Feedback System

scripts.build:production: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install --only=production
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.deploy:setup: npm run build:production && cd server && node setup-database.js

author: Prometheus Team
